column4: Anyone know what this means? Session error : Data could not be written (Input/output error) (brasero_burn_record brasero-burn.c:2839)
And I can watch the movie just fine by playing it.
Copy a disk to an iso.
oh, you mean it won't copy this particular disk?
you might want to try something like gddrescue.  If the disk has errors, it'll just write zeros
I will not be doing that haha. ( It's a movie)
oh, you might need like DVDShrink (A windows app) or something.
I wanna copy the iso ( no quality loss and can re-write ealy_)
DVDSrhink'll do that.  You just need to turn off compression.  I use it to back up all my DVDs and so I can watch em on my netbook.
I'm trying k3b as we speak. Then ill try k9copy. then the other one you said =P

bear in mind DVDShrink is Windows only, and kinda tough to get, since they don't host it in the US.  They're scared of the whole dvdcss situation, especailly since it stores an unencrypted copy and can remove region encoding.
Ill be able to get a copy =P
